column4: How come my resolv.conf is blank when I reboot.. I've but "dns-nameservers 8.8.8.8  dns-search domain.com" into /etc/network/interfaces
If you want to setup a static address I think you need to setup the values in /etc/resolv.conf manualy.
Got it working now.. Just had to make sure I put the lines in both resolv.conf and interfaces
